answers.answer: Im the same way :/ im 30 weeks and all i wanna do is eat lol and im not eating healthy foods so often either :/
I'm having the same problem I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and its a challenge

I did that with my 1st daughter all I wanted to do is eat I could never get full I gained 90 lbs I didnt even have gestational diabetes I learned my lesson from that it was soo hard to loose the weight this is my 3rd and I'm 36 weeks and I'm have only gained 14 lbs even tho u may fill hungry your really not just when u fill the want to eat get up and walk around get your mind busy or eat something healthy like carrots or broccoli that's what I do now it has helped goodluck it's really hard
Okay thank you .. I wonder why I feel hungry but I'm not this is torture! Lol
I wish I could gain weight.  I look like a walking scarecrow even though I'm eating half the time. Luckily my lil baby is a healthy weight. I weigh 110 pounds.

question: They say a healthy weight gain for an average pre pregnancy weight is 25 to 35 well I'm 31 weeks and already gained 24 pounds :/ but for some reason I can't stop eating I can never get full.. :(
title: 31 weeks & cant stop eating
